name: Amazon - Search selection
description: Use this bookmarklet to search the current text selection on Amazon. Most web browsers only support a single default search engine. This bookmarklet can be used as a shortcut to use an alternate search engine.

name: Amazon - Sort by number of reviews
description: This bookmarklet changes the sort order of your current Amazon product search to order the results by descending number of user reviews. I find that using this sort in combination with the 'Avg. Customer Review' filter greatly improves my searches.

name: Archive.today - Submit page
description: Use this bookmarklet to do a Internet Archive search for old versions of the page that you are currently on.

name: Bing - Search selection
description: Use this bookmarklet to search the current text selection on Bing. Most web browsers only support a single default search engine. This bookmarklet can be used as a shortcut to use an alternate search engine.

name: DOM - Allow copy paste
description: This bookmarklet reenables copy/paste on all elements in the page (typically a text field or text area).

name: DOM - Allow right-click
description: This bookmarklet reenables the right-click context menu on a page.

name: DOM - Allow save password
description: This bookmarklet displays the current value of a masked password field. To use the bookmarklet, simply click inside the password field that you want to be able to save, then click on the bookmarklet.

name: DOM - Enable all
description: This bookmarklet reenables every element that is disabled in the page (button, text field, etc.).

name: DOM - NATO spell selection
description: This bookmarklet spells the current selection using NATO alphabet. The case of the NATO name will be the same at the case of the original character. Characters that are not part of the NATO alphabet will be percent-encoding (e.g. %2F for '/') to help identify them. This bookmarklet can be used to identify characters that are ambiguous in certain typefaces. For example the number zero (0) will be spelled 'zero' while the letter capital O will be spelled 'Oscar'.

name: DOM - Show password
description: This bookmarklet displays the current value of a masked password field. To use the bookmarklet, simply click inside the password field that you want to be able to save, then click on the bookmarklet.

name: DOM - Strip URL parameters
description: Use this bookmarklet to remove all the URL parameters of the page that you are currently on.

name: DOM - View source
description: This bookmarklet opens a new window to display the source code of the current page. This feature is typically not available on mobile web browsers so this bookmarklet is an way to re-implement this feature using JavaScript.

name: Domaintools - Whois
description: Do a whois query on the domain that you are currently visiting using whois.domaintools.com.

name: DuckDuckGo - Search selection
description: Use this bookmarklet to search the current text selection on DuckDuckGo. Most web browsers only support a single default search engine. This bookmarklet can be used as a shortcut to use an alternate search engine.

name: Google Maps - Search selection
description: Use this bookmarklet to search the current text selection on Google Maps. Most web browsers only support a single default search engine. This bookmarklet can be used as a shortcut to use an alternate search engine.

name: Google Maps to SunCalc.org
description: Use this bookmarklet to convert the currently opened Google Maps page to SunCalc.org.

name: Google Safe Browsing - Check page status
description: Use this bookmarklet to check the page that you are currently on with Google Safe Browsing report.

name: Google Search - Search definition for selection
description: Search for a definition related to the current selection using Google.

name: Google Search - Search related sites
description: Search for sites related to the current one using Google.

name: Google Search - Search selection
description: Use this bookmarklet to search the current text selection on Google Web. Most web browsers only support a single default search engine. This bookmarklet can be used as a shortcut to use an alternate search engine.

name: Google Search - Search site
description: Use this bookmarklet to do a Google search restricted to pages from the domain that you are currently on.

name: Google Search - Search weather for selection
description: Search for weather information related to the current selection using Google.

name: Google Translate - Translate page or selection
description: Translate the current selection using Google Translate. If there is no selection, the whole page will be translated.

name: IMDb - Search selection
description: Use this bookmarklet to search the current text selection on IMDb. Most web browsers only support a single default search engine. This bookmarklet can be used as a shortcut to use an alternate search engine.

name: Internet Archive - Search page in Wayback Machine
description: Use this bookmarklet to do a Internet Archive search for old versions of the page that you are currently on.

name: MXToolBox - SuperTool
description: Run MXToolBox SuperTool on the server that you are currently on.

name: NIST NVD - Go to selected CVE
description: This bookmarklet opens a new window to display the selected CVE information.

name: Netcraft - Site report
description: Use this bookmarklet to check the site that you are currently on with Netcraft Site report.

name: Reddit - Search selection
description: Use this bookmarklet to search the current text selection on Reddit. Most web browsers only support a single default search engine. This bookmarklet can be used as a shortcut to use an alternate search engine.

name: SSLLabs - SSL server test
description: Run a SSLLabs SSL audit on the server that you are currently on.

name: Shodan - Search site
description: Search the current site on Shodan.

name: StackOverflow - Search selection
description: Use this bookmarklet to search the current text selection on StackOverflow. Most web browsers only support a single default search engine. This bookmarklet can be used as a shortcut to use an alternate search engine.

name: W3C - Check feed
description: Use this bookmarklet to check the RSS or Atom feed that you are currently on with W3C's RSS validator.

name: W3C - Check page CSS
description: Use this bookmarklet to check the page's CSS stylesheets that you are currently on with W3C's CSS validator.

name: W3C - Check page HTML
description: Use this bookmarklet to check the HTML of the page that you are currently on with W3C's Nu Html Checker.

name: W3C - Check page internationalization
description: Use this bookmarklet to check the page that you are currently on with W3C's internationalization validator.

name: W3C - Check page links
description: Use this bookmarklet to check the page that you are currently on with W3C's broken links report.

name: Who.is - Whois
description: Do a whois query on the domain that you are currently visiting using who.is.

name: Whois.com - Whois
description: Do a whois query on the domain that you are currently visiting using whois.com.

name: Wikipedia - Search selection
description: Use this bookmarklet to search the current text selection on Wikipedia. Most web browsers only support a single default search engine. This bookmarklet can be used as a shortcut to use an alternate search engine.

name: YouTube - Search selection
description: Use this bookmarklet to search the current text selection on YouTube. Most web browsers only support a single default search engine. This bookmarklet can be used as a shortcut to use an alternate search engine.
